unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Geometric vs Binomial Matching Graph
question_text: $5000$ samples were  generated.  Which graph  below represents a geometric distribution of $5000$ samples  with $p=0.70$ ?
